snippet: Unaccompanied children are among the most innocent victims of the trafficking machine that is sucking migrants into Libya’s maelstrom and out onto the Mediterranean.
abstract: Unaccompanied children, most of them from Eritrea, are among most innocent victims of human trafficking machine that is luring African migrants to chaos in Libya and onto Mediterranean Sea; International Organization for Migration says out of 170,000 migrants coming to Italy by sea from Libya in 2014, more than 13,000 were children traveling alone, and 3,394 were Eritrean.
lead_paragraph: Unaccompanied children are among the most innocent victims of the trafficking machine that is sucking migrants into Libya’s maelstrom and out onto the Mediterranean.

headline.main: Young African Migrants Caught in Trafficking Machine
headline.print_headline: African Children Caught in Trafficking Machine
